data.comment: The match has started at Neftyanik Stadium.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Ufa.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 4, Krasnodar's Wanderson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 5, In Ufa Ufa's Igor Bezdenezhnykh is caught offside.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Remy Cabella for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Important block from the Ufa defence as Sergei Petrov fires in a strike for Krasnodar.
In the minute 11, Ufa needs to be cautious. Krasnodar have an attacking throw-in.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Ufa.
In the minute 15, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
In Ufa, Wanderson of Krasnodar is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 21, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa.
Vyacheslav Krotov of Ufa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 24, Krasnodar are coming forward and Kaio Pantaleao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Ufa.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
In the minute 29, Krasnodar's Daniil Utkin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sergey Karasev awards Ufa a goal kick.
In Ufa Krasnodar drive forward through Daniil Utkin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 31, Krasnodar's Cristian Ramirez gets in a shot on goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
In the minute 33, In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Ufa.
At Neftyanik Stadium, Sergei Petrov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 35, Ufa drive upfield and Artem Golubev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Krasnodar's Wanderson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
In the minute 40, Sergey Karasev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ufa's half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Ufa throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Igor Bezdenezhnykh (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Krasnodar pushes forward through Marcus Berg, whose finish on goal is saved.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Ufa in the half of Krasnodar.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Sergey Karasev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Aleksey Nikitin gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Krasnodar defence.
Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) gets in a header – but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 49, Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Ufa.
Krasnodar push upfield and Marcus Berg gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Ufa defence.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Kristoffer Olsson for Krasnodar has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Krasnodar take a 0-1 lead thanks to Remy Cabella.
Wanderson with an assist there.
In the minute 54, Nikolay Giorgobyani is on a sub for Vyacheslav Krotov for Ufa.
Andres Vombergar is replacing Gamid Agalarov for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ufa's Igor Bezdenezhnykh breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Krasnodar's Wanderson misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 61, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Cristian Ramirez (Krasnodar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 63, Goal! Krasnodar extend their lead to 0-2 through Remy Cabella.
Great play from Kristoffer Olsson to set up the goal.
Goal! Marcus Berg extends Krasnodar's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 65, That's a fine assist from Wanderson.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Bojan Jokic (Ufa) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 68, Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a first substitution, with Shapi Suleymanov replacing Remy Cabella.
Ufa make their third substitution with Kirill Folmer replacing Igor Bezdenezhnykh.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 71, Sergey Karasev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 73, Krasnodar are pushing forward but Cristian Ramirez's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Murad Olegovich Musaev is making the team's second substitution at Neftyanik Stadium with Igor Smolnikov replacing Sergei Petrov.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Daniil Utkin (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In Ufa Krasnodar attack through Daniil Utkin. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Shapi Suleymanov of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Krasnodar are in shooting range from this free kick.
Krasnodar are coming forward and Cristian Ramirez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Kristoffer Olsson with Alex Matsukatov. This is the third substitution made today by Murad Olegovich Musaev.
Maksim Kutovoy is replacing Marcus Berg for the away team.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Krasnodar.
In the minute 83, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
The home team have replaced Artem Golubev with Nikita Belousov. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vadim Evseev.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa.
In the minute 85, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 87, Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Ufa's area.
Sergey Karasev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ufa's half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Ufa just outside Krasnodar's area.
Ufa surge into the attack at Neftyanik Stadium but Andres Vombergar’s header is off-target.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-3.
